abstract: Data show that Occupy Wall Street protesters chose well in selecting New York City to stage their campaign against economic inequality; among the 1 percent of American households with the highest income, a significant portion, 13 percent, live in the New York metropolitan area, with 4.4 percent living in Manhattan.
snippet: With a significant portion of the wealthiest Americans based in New York, the divisions are clear.
lead_paragraph: With a significant portion of the wealthiest Americans based in New York, the divisions are clear.

headline.main: As the Data Show, There’s a Reason the Wall Street Protesters Chose New York
headline.print_headline: As the Data Show, There’s a Reason the Protesters Chose New York
headline.seo: Protesters Said, the Data Show It: Much Wealth Resides in New York
